mapper.select:
SELECT OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,TGT_LOT_ID ,SRC_CARR_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,SRC_PROD_MTRL_ID ,TGT_CARR_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,TGT_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PRIRT_NO ,SORTER_JOB_TYP ,DTL_SORTER_JOB_TYP ,JOB_STAT_CD ,PROC_SGMT_ID ,PROC_SGMT_SEQ ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD FROM WN_SORTER_JOB_RESV
AND SITE_ID = #{pSiteId} AND JOB_ID = #{pJobId} AND JOB_STAT_CD = #{pJobStatCd} AND USE_STAT_CD = #{pUseStatCd}

SELECT OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,TGT_LOT_ID ,SRC_CARR_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,SRC_PROD_MTRL_ID ,TGT_CARR_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,TGT_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PRIRT_NO ,SORTER_JOB_TYP ,DTL_SORTER_JOB_TYP ,JOB_STAT_CD ,PROC_SGMT_ID ,PROC_SGMT_SEQ ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD FROM WN_SORTER_JOB_RESV
AND SITE_ID = #{pSiteId} AND EQP_ID = #{pEqpId} AND PRIRT_NO > #{pPrirtNo} AND USE_STAT_CD = #{pUseStatCd}

SELECT OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,TGT_LOT_ID ,SRC_CARR_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,SRC_PROD_MTRL_ID ,TGT_CARR_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,TGT_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PRIRT_NO ,SORTER_JOB_TYP ,DTL_SORTER_JOB_TYP ,JOB_STAT_CD ,PROC_SGMT_ID ,PROC_SGMT_SEQ ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD FROM WN_SORTER_JOB_EXEC
AND SITE_ID = #{pSiteId} AND JOB_ID = #{pJobId} AND JOB_STAT_CD = #{pJobStatCd} AND USE_STAT_CD = #{pUseStatCd}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO WN_SORTER_JOB_EXEC ( OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,TGT_LOT_ID ,SRC_CARR_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,SRC_PROD_MTRL_ID ,TGT_CARR_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,TGT_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PRIRT_NO ,SORTER_JOB_TYP ,DTL_SORTER_JOB_TYP ,JOB_STAT_CD ,PROC_SGMT_ID ,PROC_SGMT_SEQ ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD ) SELECT #{objId} ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,TGT_LOT_ID ,SRC_CARR_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,SRC_PROD_MTRL_ID ,TGT_CARR_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,TGT_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PRIRT_NO ,SORTER_JOB_TYP ,DTL_SORTER_JOB_TYP ,'Wait' ,PROC_SGMT_ID ,PROC_SGMT_SEQ ,#{mdfyUserId} ,SYSDATE ,#{crtUserId} ,SYSDATE ,'' ,#{evntNm} ,SYSDATE ,'' ,'' ,'' ,#{tid} ,'' ,'Usable' FROM WN_SORTER_JOB_RESV WHERE SITE_ID = #{pSiteId} AND JOB_ID = #{pJobId} AND USE_STAT_CD = #{pUseStatCd}
SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF6') || '-' || SYS_GUID() as objId FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO WH_SORTER_JOB_RESV ( OBJ_ID ,REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,TGT_LOT_ID ,SRC_CARR_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,SRC_PROD_MTRL_ID ,TGT_CARR_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,TGT_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PRIRT_NO ,SORTER_JOB_TYP ,DTL_SORTER_JOB_TYP ,JOB_STAT_CD ,PROC_SGMT_ID ,PROC_SGMT_SEQ ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD) SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF6') || '-' || SYS_GUID() FROM DUAL) AS OBJ_ID ,OBJ_ID as REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,TGT_LOT_ID ,SRC_CARR_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,SRC_PROD_MTRL_ID ,TGT_CARR_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,TGT_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PRIRT_NO ,SORTER_JOB_TYP ,DTL_SORTER_JOB_TYP ,JOB_STAT_CD ,PROC_SGMT_ID ,PROC_SGMT_SEQ ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD FROM WN_SORTER_JOB_RESV WHERE OBJ_ID = #{objId}

INSERT INTO WH_SORTER_JOB_EXEC ( OBJ_ID ,REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,TGT_LOT_ID ,SRC_CARR_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,SRC_PROD_MTRL_ID ,TGT_CARR_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,TGT_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PRIRT_NO ,SORTER_JOB_TYP ,DTL_SORTER_JOB_TYP ,JOB_STAT_CD ,PROC_SGMT_ID ,PROC_SGMT_SEQ ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD) SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF6') || '-' || SYS_GUID() FROM DUAL) AS OBJ_ID ,OBJ_ID as REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,TGT_LOT_ID ,SRC_CARR_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,SRC_PROD_MTRL_ID ,TGT_CARR_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,TGT_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PRIRT_NO ,SORTER_JOB_TYP ,DTL_SORTER_JOB_TYP ,JOB_STAT_CD ,PROC_SGMT_ID ,PROC_SGMT_SEQ ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,EVNT_NM ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,RSN_CD ,TID ,TRNS_CM ,USE_STAT_CD FROM WN_SORTER_JOB_EXEC WHERE OBJ_ID = #{objId}

INSERT INTO WH_SORTER_JOB_SLOT_INFO ( OBJ_ID ,REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,TGT_LOT_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,PROD_MTRL_ID ,SCAN_SLOT_NO ,SCAN_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PROD_MTRL_STRT_TM ,PROD_MTRL_END_TM ,JOB_STAT_CD ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID ) SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF6') || '-' || SYS_GUID() FROM DUAL) AS OBJ_ID ,OBJ_ID AS REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,JOB_ID ,EQP_ID ,SRC_LOT_ID ,SRC_SLOT_NO ,TGT_LOT_ID ,TGT_SLOT_NO ,PROD_MTRL_ID ,SCAN_SLOT_NO ,SCAN_PROD_MTRL_ID ,PROD_MTRL_STRT_TM ,PROD_MTRL_END_TM ,JOB_STAT_CD ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID FROM WN_SORTER_JOB_SLOT_INFO WHERE OBJ_ID = #{objId}
